Posts.Content: Hi I'm new here, I found a lump in my breast & under my arm pit, been to breast clinic doctor had a feel about & said don't think it's much to worry about but sent me to have some tests so had mammogram ultrasound & biopsy, went back into doctor who then told me my lump was suspicious & that she'd like to send me for a ct scan & bone scan, also there was a nurse present who said make sure you bring someone with you when you return for results. The doctor left the room & nurse continued to talk about members of the team & that I was high priority, she then gave me a information sheet, she said I needed some bloods taken so said she'd send in the other nurse, I then broke down cause it all got complicated I had gone on my own. What I'm worrying about is I think they know that it could be the C word otherwise why have the scans done before the biopsy results? I could be completely wrong, has anyone else had a similar experience to this? I must however point out that the clinic was very very good & I was seen quickly & all the staff were excellent
Posts.Title: possible breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi thank you for being honest I'd prefer that, yes it's a lot to take in & yes happening very quick too but I surpose they have to be, unfortunately cancer does run on my dad's side but it was lung not breast cancer, I will just have to take each day as it comes, I've been through two life saving heart operations so I'm fairly strong, as that was very tough. My family are very supportive so I know I'll be takin care of.  I also have a beautiful grandson that I want to see grow up so I'll be fighting it Thank you again (((((Hugs too)))))
Posts.Title: possible breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi  Thank you that's a good idea, I may ask them if that's ok Hugs xxxx
